casebody.data:
MEEKS v. FLOURNEY, SHERIFF, et al. No. 81,

Misc.

Decided February 24, 1969. Crawford C. Martin, Attorney General of Texas, Nola White, First Assistant Attorney General, A. J. Ca-rubbi, Jr., Executive Assistant Attorney General, and Robert C. Flowers, Lonny F. Zwiener, and Gilbert J. Pena, Assistant Attorneys General, for respondents. Per Curiam.

The motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and the petition for a writ of certiorari are granted. The judgment is vacated and the case is remanded to the Supreme Court of Texas for further consideration in light of Smith v. Hooey, ante, p. 374.
